translation.en: My name is Dalton Russell.
translation.zh: 我叫达尔顿拉塞尔

translation.en: Pay strict attention to what I say
translation.zh: 仔细注意听我说 因为我是字斟句酌的

translation.en: because I choose my words carefully, and I never repeat myself.

translation.en: I've told you my name. That's the who.

translation.en: The where could be most readily described as a prison cell.

translation.en: But there's a vast difference between being stuck in a tiny cell
translation.zh: 但待在一个小房间里 和被关在监狱里

translation.en: and being in prison.
translation.zh: 还是有很大区别的

translation.en: The what is easy.

translation.en: Recently I planned and set in motion events
translation.zh: 最近 我策划并发动了一些事

translation.en: to execute the perfect bank robbery.
translation.zh: 以便执行我的完美银行抢劫计划

translation.en: That's also the when.
translation.zh: 这也回答了“什么时候”的问题

translation.en: As for the why, beyond the obvious financial motivation,
translation.zh: 至于“为什么” 并非是常见的金钱动机

translation.en: it's exceedingly simple:
translation.zh: 原因极其简单

translation.en: because I can.
translation.zh: 因为我能做到

translation.en: Which leaves us only with the how.
translation.zh: 剩下就是“怎么做”了

translation.en: And therein, as the Bard would tell us,
translation.zh: 就像莎士比亚说的

translation.en: lies the rub.

translation.en: So your mother tells me about...

translation.en: a certain young lady is helping you with the Triborough Bridge project?

translation.en: - Mm-hmm. - Okay.
translation.zh: 没错 -好吗？ -好吧

translation.en: ( laughs ) He's crazy.

translation.en: Now on 51st?

translation.en: No, he's still on 47th Street,

translation.en: but it's a much smaller space.

translation.en: We'll get lobster. I'll put it on Mr. Ansonori's card.

translation.en: Whatever. It's a meeting with one of his clients or something.

translation.en: Because it's been, like, over a year now. Yeah...

translation.en: ( groans ) I want to snap this guy's neck, I swear to God.
translation.zh: 我真的很想拗断他的脖子

translation.en: they'll take care of you over there. That's their specialty.

translation.en: Woman: So what? They're flowers. They could have been to his grandmother.

translation.en: They could have been for me. It's my birthday.

translation.en: Okay, so maybe it's a client's.

translation.en: ( chuckles ) Okay, this is funny.

translation.en: I got this guy in front of me that thinks...

translation.en: I see him looking at me. Fantastic.

translation.en: - Yeah? - Can you lower your voice just a little bit, please?

translation.en: You're getting a little loud on your phone. Please.

translation.en: - Yeah, fine. - I don't want you disturbing the other customers.

translation.en: They want to lock me up. This 140 grand doesn't

translation.en: show up somewhere soon, things can get rough for me.

translation.en: - But you didn't take it. - Of course I didn't take it, baby.

translation.en: It's just some lying drug dealer trying to save his own ass by fucking me over.

translation.en: Then I'll make first grade, then we'll have enough money to buy a bigger place.

translation.en: sticks a .357 in my face,

translation.en: screaming in some foreign accent about killing hostages.

translation.en: Okay.

translation.en: Pop, what's going on? Yo.

translation.en: All bank employees, raise your hands!

translation.en: Bank employees, this side! Everyone else, over there!

translation.zh: 我不会打电话问歹徒能帮他做什么 看看他会怎么办

translation.en: Your call.
translation.zh: 你说了算

translation.en: Mr. Case, why don't you let me explain to you how I work?
translation.zh: 卡斯先生 请让我解释一下 我的做事方式

translation.en: Please. That would be nice.
translation.zh: 请吧 这样很好

translation.en: Well, you say that there are family heirlooms inside your safety-deposit box.
translation.zh: 你说在你的保险箱里放着传家宝

translation.en: That's fine. But in my experience,
translation.zh: 没关系 但就我的经验 你这样的人 有很多亲信

translation.en: people like you have people working for them
translation.zh: 但就我的经验 你这样的人 有很多亲信

translation.en: that handle these kinds of things. And when they can't,
translation.zh: 由亲信处理这些事 他无法处理此事时 不会给我打电话

translation.en: they don't call me, their people call me.
translation.zh: 他无法处理此事时 不会给我打电话 会让亲信打给我

translation.en: So immediately I know that there's something in that box
translation.zh: 所以 我立刻知道保险柜里有东西

translation.en: that you don't even want your closest aides to know about.
translation.zh: 就连亲信你都不想让他们知道

translation.en: No problem with me. You tell me
translation.zh: 对我来说无所谓 你告诉我 我不需要知道里面有什么 我也就不需要知道

translation.en: I don't need to know what's in that box, and I don't need to know.
translation.zh: 你告诉我 我不需要知道里面有什么 我也就不需要知道

translation.en: But if you tell me that it's a bunch of old baseball cards
translation.zh: 但如果你告诉我里面是旧棒球卡

translation.en: and I find out that it's the launch codes for a nuclear missile,
translation.zh: 然而我发现的是核弹发射密码

translation.en: then let's just say we no longer have an agreement.
translation.zh: 那么我们之间的协议也就不复存在

translation.en: - Have you finished? - Yes.
translation.zh: -说完了吗？ -完了

translation.en: What's inside that box, young lady,
translation.zh: 保险箱里的东西属于我 年轻女士

translation.en: has belonged to me since before you were born.
translation.zh: 保险箱里的东西属于我 年轻女士 你还没出生之前就是

translation.en: It's very valuable and poses no danger whatsoever to anyone.
translation.zh: 非常珍贵 却不会对任何人造成危害

translation.en: Except to you. ( chuckles )
translation.zh: 除了你

translation.en: Okay. Well first, there are men with guns in there,
translation.zh: 好吧 首先 里面有持枪歹徒

translation.en: so I can't guarantee any results, agreed?
translation.zh: 所以我无法保证后果 同意吗？

translation.en: - Of course. - All right.
translation.zh: -当然 -很好

translation.en: Now what makes you think that they want to rob your box?
translation.zh: 你为何觉得他们想抢你的保险箱？

translation.en: - I don't. - ( chuckles )
translation.zh: 我没觉得

translation.en: Why don't you tell me how you would like this to end then, hmm?
translation.zh: 不如你告诉我 你想如何收尾？

translation.en: I'd prefer that nobody ever touch my safe-deposit box--
translation.zh: 我希望没有人会碰到我的保险箱

translation.en: not them, not you, not the authorities.
translation.zh: 歹徒 你 警方都不行

translation.en: And the sooner the situation ends, the happier I'll be.
translation.zh: 这个状况越快结束 我越高兴

translation.en: - Is that specific enough for you? - No.
translation.zh: -够具体了吗？ -不

translation.en: The contents of that box...
translation.zh: 保险箱里的东西…

translation.en: are of great value to me,
translation.zh: 对我来说价值连城

translation.en: so long as they remain my secret. And if they're exposed?
translation.zh: -那里有我的秘密 -如果被暴露？

translation.en: I'll face some difficult questions.
translation.zh: 我会面对一些难堪的问题

translation.en: So it stays locked or it disappears.
translation.zh: -所以必须锁起来或让其消失 -没错

translation.en: Precisely. Can you make that happen?
translation.zh: -所以必须锁起来或让其消失 -没错 -你能做到吗？ -能

translation.en: - Yes. - I hope so.
translation.zh: -你能做到吗？ -能 希望如此 但不得不说我还存有疑虑

translation.en: I have to say, I can't help but be skeptical.
translation.zh: 希望如此 但不得不说我还存有疑虑

translation.en: Whoever gave you my number got the same deal.
translation.zh: 向你推荐我的人也和我做过交易

translation.en: Clearly they must have been satisfied.
translation.zh: 显然他们已经满意了

translation.en: - Steve. - It's time for Steve-O.
translation.zh: -史蒂夫？ -这次是史蒂夫欧

translation.en: I came out here to take a look at the perimeter they laid out.
translation.zh: 我去勘察现场

translation.en: Guess what I found? That hostage they let out
translation.zh: 猜猜我发现了什么？ 被放出来的人质 说歹徒穿油漆工衣服进来的 对吧？

translation.en: - said these guys came in dressed like painters, right? - Yeah.
translation.zh: 被放出来的人质 说歹徒穿油漆工衣服进来的 对吧？ 没错

translation.en: - Probably stolen. - Have 'em run it, check it for prints.
translation.zh: -可能是偷来的 -让他们查查指纹

translation.en: - Everybody on? - Yep, go ahead.
translation.zh: -都准备好了吗？ -是的

translation.en: - Sure you got the right number? - Absolutely.
translation.zh: -确认电话没错？ -绝对没错

translation.en: Okay. Nothing yet.
translation.zh: 好吧 没人接

translation.en: - We got video. - Let's have it.
translation.zh: -拿到监控视频了 -看看吧

translation.en: Frazier: Oh! What happened to that camera right there?
translation.zh: 那个摄像头怎么了？

translation.en: Officer: Wait, hold on, hold on, hold on.
translation.zh: 等等…

translation.en: Frazier: Here it is. That guy right there.
translation.zh: 就是这里 那个人

translation.en: It's like he blinds the camera with the flashlight.
translation.zh: 他用闪光灯破坏了摄像头

translation.en: It's like nobody else sees it.
translation.zh: 很奇怪 对吧？好像别人都没看到

translation.en: You'd think it'd be pretty bright, no?
translation.zh: -不觉得光线会很亮吗？ -可能是红外线

translation.en: - Could be infrared. - What's that?
translation.zh: -不觉得光线会很亮吗？ -可能是红外线 -那是什么？ -红外线灯

translation.en: Infrared bulb. See, humans can't see it,
translation.zh: -那是什么？ -红外线灯 人眼看不到 但摄像头会捕捉到

translation.en: but a video camera will pick it up.
translation.zh: 人眼看不到 但摄像头会捕捉到

translation.en: - He could knock out the cameras without no one knowing. - Right.
translation.zh: 他可在无人注意的情况下 破坏摄像头 没错…

translation.en: - He knocked out the cameras about 10:00. - So for approximately
translation.zh: 大约10点时将摄像头弄坏 所以大概过了两分钟

translation.en: two minutes, we got no evidence
translation.zh: 所以大概过了两分钟 我们看不出有谁进出银行 真棒

translation.en: of people leaving or entering the bank. That's great.
translation.zh: 我们看不出有谁进出银行 真棒

translation.en: Frazier: Miriam, how long were you there before it began?
translation.zh: 米莉亚姆 抢劫开始前 你在里面待了多久？

translation.en: It was just a few minutes.
translation.zh: 就几分钟

translation.en: Can you tell us what happened after the explosion and the smoke?
translation.zh: 你能告诉我们爆炸和浓烟后 发生了什么事吗？

translation.en: They just told us to put our heads down
translation.zh: 他们让我们低下头 闭上眼

translation.en: and then close our eyes, and then, um,
translation.zh: 他们让我们低下头 闭上眼 之后 我记得其中有个歹徒

translation.en: I just remember one of them telling the others
translation.zh: 之后 我记得其中有个歹徒

translation.en: to just go down and fix the cameras.
translation.zh: 让其他人去修好了摄像头

translation.en: The video cameras? I don't know.
translation.zh: -视频摄像头？ -我不知道

translation.en: - Anything else you want to share with us? - No.
translation.zh: -还有什么信息能提供给我们？ -没了 只是…

translation.en: - You sure? - Yeah, I...
translation.zh: -你确定？ -没错 我…

translation.en: Could you give us the names of the bank robbers?
translation.zh: 你能够告诉我们歹徒名字吗？

translation.en: - ( crying, laughing ) - I'm just messing with you.
translation.zh: 我只是在和你开玩笑 亲爱的

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: -你还好吗？ -谢谢你

translation.en: - It was pretty awful. - Was it bad?
translation.zh: -真的太可怕了 -很糟糕吗？

translation.en: I mean, they made us strip. They made us take off our clothes!
translation.zh: 他们让我们脱衣服

translation.en: I don't understand why they had to do that.
translation.zh: 我不知道他们为什么这样做

translation.en: I really just thought-- I thought I was gonna be killed.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得…我会被杀死

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 好吧…

translation.en: all right, my dear. Okay. I can go?
translation.zh: -没事的 亲爱的 -好的

translation.en: - No. - No?
translation.zh: -我可以走了？ -还不行 -不行？ -不 你得留下

translation.en: No, you got to stay. No, you can go.
translation.zh: -不行？ -不 你得留下 你得留下 不 你可以走了

translation.en: - No, stay. No, go. - ( laughing )
translation.zh: 留下 走吧

translation.en: Did you rob the bank? Did you rob the bank? You sure?
translation.zh: 你抢银行了吗？ -你抢了 -你抢银行了吗？ -没有 -你确定？

translation.en: - There's movement at the front door. - Let's go.
translation.zh: 前门有情况 走

translation.en: - Put down the fucking weapon! - Don't shoot! Don't shoot!
translation.zh: -放下武器 -别开枪

translation.en: - Don't move! - ( muffled shouts )
translation.zh: 别动…

translation.en: I said put your hands on your head and get down on your fucking knees!
translation.zh: 把手放在头上 跪下

translation.en: I said hands on your head and down on your knees now!
translation.zh: 把手放在头上跪下

translation.en: - Hands are tied. - Hands are tied.
translation.zh: 手被捆住了

translation.en: - Jesus, pat him down. - All right.
translation.zh: -手被捆住了 -杰西 搜身 好的

translation.en: - I'm one of the hostages. - Careful. Easy. Be very careful now.
translation.zh: -我是人质 -小心 淡定 非常小心 -我待的地方看不到他 -淡定

translation.en: - Easy, easy. - I can see him. I got a clear shot.
translation.zh: -我待的地方看不到他 -淡定 -我可以看到他 我那里很清楚 -有武器吗？

translation.en: Any weapons?
translation.zh: -我可以看到他 我那里很清楚 -有武器吗？

translation.en: - Who are you? - Vikram Walia. I work in the bank.
translation.zh: -你是谁？ -维克拉姆瓦利亚 银行员工

translation.en: Okay, Vikram, is this a bomb?
translation.zh: 维克拉姆？这是炸弹吗？

translation.en: Oh shit, a fucking Arab!
translation.zh: -该死 是个阿拉伯人 -什么？不 我是锡克教的

translation.en: - I'm a Sikh. - Is that a bomb?
translation.zh: -该死 是个阿拉伯人 -什么？不 我是锡克教的 -是炸弹吗？ -不

translation.en: Answer me! Is this a bomb? Are you booby-trapped?
translation.zh: 回答我 是炸弹？你是人肉弹吗？

translation.en: - No! Fuck, no! - Okay, Vikram, I need you to relax.
translation.zh: -不 不是 -好了 维克拉姆 放松

translation.en: Jesus, give me a hand.
translation.zh: -杰西 帮我一下 -我不知道

translation.en: - Just watch. There's a lot of movement in that bank. - Take him down!
translation.zh: 银行里有动静 -拿下他 -麦克 就是现在 拿下他

translation.en: - Now! Get him! Get on the ground! - Fuck! Easy!
translation.zh: 怎么回事？淡定…

translation.en: That's my turban. Get off. Easy.
translation.zh: 放开…那是我的头巾 别碰 淡定

translation.en: - My turban! Give me my turban back! - Quiet!
translation.zh: 别…我的头巾 该死 把我的头巾还我

translation.en: - Shut up! Relax! - What the fuck are you doing? Give me my turban back!
translation.zh: 好了 闭嘴 放松 你在干什么？把我的头巾还我

translation.en: - You didn't need to rip-- What the... - Come on, move!
translation.zh: -不能扯下我的头巾 -闭嘴 怎么回事？别碰我

translation.en: Get your fucking hands off me!
translation.zh: 怎么回事？别碰我

translation.en: And the 11:00 and 12:00?
Don't forget about your 1:00 with Chancellor Joel Klein.
translation.zh: 别忘记你1点和乔尔克莱因局长有约

translation.en: - Ah, Madge... - Your Honor?
translation.zh: -马奇 今天真忙 -市长阁下

translation.en: - Madeline, how are you? - I'm just fine.
translation.zh: 麦德琳 你好吗？

translation.en: - Thank you for seeing me on such short notice. - Sure.
translation.zh: 很好 但谢谢你临时抽空见我 -没问题 马奇 没事了吗？ -没事了 市长先生

translation.en: - Madge, are we through here? - Yes, Mr. Mayor.
translation.zh: -没问题 马奇 没事了吗？ -没事了 市长先生

translation.en: This way, Miss White.
translation.zh: 这边走 魏特小姐

translation.en: I always have time to put on a tux and eat free food for a good cause.
translation.zh: 我总是有时间穿燕尾服 有理由吃免费的食物

translation.en: Who are we saving this week?
translation.zh: 这周又要拯救谁？

translation.en: Well, I'm doing a round of support for the Joseph Freedkin
translation.zh: 我在为约瑟夫弗里德金纪念基金

translation.en: Memorial Fund for spinal cord research,
translation.zh: 支持脊髓研究的事寻求支持

translation.en: and we're having our annual fund-raiser next month.
translation.zh: 下个月要评定年度筹资人

translation.en: If you could attend, it'd give us such a boost.
translation.zh: 如果你能参加 简直蓬荜生辉

translation.en: It would be my pleasure. Is there anything else I can do to--
translation.zh: 非常高兴 还有什么需要我帮…？

translation.en: - What the fuck do you want? - A favor.
translation.zh: -你到底想要什么？ -帮我个忙

translation.en: No shit. Which kind? The last one I'll ever ask of you.
translation.zh: -别废话 什么事？ -这是我最后一次求你

translation.en: That's the kind I had in mind.
translation.zh: 我也是这样认为的

translation.en: You know about this hostage situation? On my way. What's it to do with you?
translation.zh: -你知道人质的事件 -我正要过去 和你有何关系？

translation.en: All right, well, I need to keep an eye on it,
translation.zh: 好吧 我需要关注这件事

translation.en: so I want you to bring me down there and tell whoever's in charge
translation.zh: 所以我想让你带我去 并告诉负责人

translation.en: to extend me every courtesy.
translation.zh: 请让我参与一切行动

translation.en: ( chuckles ) You're out of your fucking mind.
translation.zh: 你简直疯了

translation.en: Well if it was easy, it wouldn't square us, would it?
translation.zh: 没错 如果是容易事 我们也扯不平 对吧？

translation.en: - It's impossible. - Nothing's impossible.
translation.zh: -不可能 -没什么不可能

translation.en: You just have to call in a few markers, that's all.
translation.zh: 你只需找欠你人情的人 就可以了

translation.en: I may have to give out a few. Then that's exactly what you'll do.
translation.zh: -我恐怕得欠别人的情 -那你就这么做

translation.en: You're a magnificent cunt.
translation.zh: 你这个难缠的贱人

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: ...a very tense situation for several hours now.
translation.zh: 几个小时了 情势一直非常危急

translation.en: It's unclear how many hostages are inside
translation.zh: 不清楚有多少人质在里面

translation.en: and how many robbers police are dealing with.
translation.zh: 也不知道警方面对的是几名歹徒

translation.en: Officials say this all started out as a robbery at Manhattan Trust,
translation.zh: 警方称开始是一宗针对曼哈顿信托的 抢劫案

translation.en: but has turned into this hostage situation.
translation.zh: 后来有人质被扣留

translation.en: Negotiators are here on the scene working very hard,
translation.zh: 谈判专家在现场 努力工作

translation.en: and it's still unclear on any possible injuries.
translation.zh: 但还不清楚是否有人受伤

translation.en: Of course, we'll keep you up to date with the very latest,
translation.zh: 当然 我们会向您播报最新进展

translation.en: and we will remain here on the scene as this all unfolds.
translation.zh: 我们会在事件解决前一直留在现场

translation.en: That's the latest from here in lower Manhattan.
translation.zh: 这是来自曼哈顿下区的最新消息

translation.en: Reporting live, I'm Sandra Endo. Back to you.
translation.zh: 现场播报 我是桑德拉远藤 马上回来

translation.en: Vikram: Protect and serve, my ass. Where's my turban?
translation.zh: “保护和服务”个鬼 我的头巾呢？

translation.en: I'm not talking to anybody without a turban.
translation.zh: 没有头巾我不会和任何人说话

translation.en: It's part of my religion to cover my head in respect to God. I'm a Sikh.
translation.zh: 没有头巾我不会和任何人说话 这是我的宗教信仰 要遮住头 这是对神的尊重 我是锡克教徒

translation.en: - Okay, we'll find your turban. - Not an Arab, by the way, like your cops called me.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们去找头巾 还有 我不是阿拉伯人 警察刚在外面那样叫我

translation.en: I don't think you heard that.
translation.zh: 现在 我想你一定听错了

translation.en: There was a lot going on. You were probably disoriented. I didn't hear that.
translation.zh: 发生了很多事 你可能有点错乱了

translation.en: I heard what I heard. I'll give you all the information you want.
translation.zh: -我没听到 -我听到就是听到了 我会给你们所有想要的信息

translation.en: I don't need this. I need my turban. It's part of my religion.
translation.zh: 我不需要这个 我要头巾 这是我的信仰

translation.en: - We'll get you your turban. - We'll find it for you.
translation.zh: -我们会给你找到头巾 -我们会给你找

translation.en: No no no. Not get me. I want my turban now.
translation.zh: 不 别“会给我找” 我现在就要

translation.en: You just got to start thinking about the people inside the bank.
translation.zh: 你得开始想想银行里的人 里面情势危急

translation.en: You got to start telling us what's going on inside the bank.
translation.zh: 你得告诉我们里面发生了什么

translation.en: We can talk about this later. We'll get an officer
translation.zh: 我们可以晚点谈这个 我们让一位警官下来

translation.en: to come down, you can write a formal complaint.
translation.zh: 我们可以晚点谈这个 我们让一位警官下来 你可以写一份正式的投诉

translation.en: But for now we got to deal with this situation.
translation.zh: 但现在 我们得处理这个情况

translation.en: First you beat me and now you want my help?
translation.zh: 你先打了我 现在却想让我帮忙

translation.en: You need to start thinking about your co-workers.
translation.zh: 你得开始想想自己的同事

translation.en: I apologize on behalf of the NYPD, but that was not us.
translation.zh: 我会代表纽约警局道歉 但刚才不是我们的错 我们是警探

translation.en: - We are detectives. We're gonna try and find-- - What do you want to know?
translation.zh: 我会代表纽约警局道歉 但刚才不是我们的错 我们是警探 -我们会试着找出… -你们想知道什么？

translation.en: - How many were there? - I think there were about four.
translation.zh: -我们会试着找出… -你们想知道什么？ -里面有几个歹徒？ -我想是四个

translation.en: - How many hostages? - I don't know how many hostages. 20, 30.
translation.zh: -多少人质？ -不知道 可能20或30

translation.en: Fucking tired of this shit. What happened to my fucking civil rights?
translation.zh: 我受够这些了 我的公民权利呢？

translation.en: Why can't I go anywhere without being harassed?
translation.zh: 我走到哪里都会受到骚扰？

translation.en: Get thrown out of a bank. I'm a hostage; I get harassed;
translation.zh: 我被从银行扔出来 我是人质 我受到了骚扰 我要去机场

translation.en: I go to the airport, I can't go through security without random selection.
translation.zh: 我被从银行扔出来 我是人质 我受到了骚扰 我要去机场 没有“随机”安检我都进不了机场

translation.en: Fucking random, my ass.
translation.zh: 该死的随机 我差点丢了工作

translation.en: I bet you can get a cab, though.
translation.zh: 不过我想你一定拦得到出租车

translation.en: I guess that's one of the perks.
translation.zh: 我想这是唯一的好处

translation.en: ( chuckles ) Put the ice on your face.
translation.zh: 把冰放你脸上

translation.en: Frazier: Two buses with full gas tanks,
translation.zh: “两辆加满油的公交 一架加满油的喷气式客机

translation.en: one jumbo jet with full gas tank and pilots
translation.zh: “两辆加满油的公交 一架加满油的喷气式客机 配备飞行员 停在肯尼迪机场跑道最后面”

translation.en: at JFK parked in their runway.
translation.zh: 配备飞行员 停在肯尼迪机场跑道最后面”

translation.en: - Call her. - I'm gonna regret this.

translation.en: Enver Hoxha is dead. That's a tape of him discussing

translation.en: how Albanian people are great people, they're immortal people.

translation.en: - They knew we were gonna bug 'em. - Damn right, they knew how.

translation.en: so they could send us on a wild-goose chase.

translation.en: Good. Good. What do you have in mind?

translation.en: She has a certain amount of influence in these matters,

translation.en: for reasons which I can't share with you.

translation.en: there are matters at stake here that are a little bit above your pay grade--
translation.zh: 这里情势危急 并已超出你的权限范围 无意冒犯 他是想帮你

translation.en: no offense-- and he's offering to help you.

translation.en: to the proper level, and problem solved?

translation.en: You'll have it ready in the time I gave you,

translation.en: All right. I'm on it. I'm on it.

translation.en: Let's just try to keep everybody calm, okay?

translation.en: - Don't I sound calm to you? - Yeah, you do.

translation.en: Yeah, you do.

translation.en: - Can I have a glass of water? - Are you thirsty?

translation.en: - My throat's parched. I'm not th-- - "Throat's parched"?
translation.zh: -你渴吗？ -我的喉咙很干 -我不紧张 -你的喉咙干？

translation.en: - His throat is parched. - I just want a glass of water.

translation.en: Oh, shit! ( laughing )

translation.en: When you start telling us what really happened you'll get some water.

translation.en: - You want some coffee? - That's all right.

translation.en: - I don't drink that stuff. - Did you know they were robbing the bank?

translation.en: I didn't know they were robbing the bank but I know they put a gun in my face.
translation.zh: -你知道他们要抢银行吗？ -他们掏出枪时 我才意识到 所以你才开着门迎接他们？

translation.en: How do you know they robbed the bank?
translation.zh: -你怎么知道他们要抢银行？ -因为他们掏出枪指着我

translation.en: - They pulled a gun in my face. - That doesn't mean they were robbing the bank.
translation.zh: -你怎么知道他们要抢银行？ -因为他们掏出枪指着我 这也不意味着要抢银行

translation.en: - Did you see them take money? - I was in a bank and I was locked up
translation.zh: 拿钱了吗？你看到他们拿钱了？ 我在银行里 也不知道被锁了多久

translation.en: for who knows how long, tied up in a room.
translation.zh: 我在银行里 也不知道被锁了多久 -好吧 -被绑在房子里 我看到你看见我了

translation.en: - I saw you see me. - You saw me see you? Is that what you just said?
translation.zh: -好吧 -被绑在房子里 我看到你看见我了 你看到我看见你了？你刚这么说的？ 没错 我被关在房子里 你进来时看到我被堵着嘴

translation.en: I was locked up in the room. You saw me gagged when you came in.

translation.en: Listen, I can't work miracles here. I'm gonna need more time.

translation.en: Well perhaps if you'd use the time that I gave you
translation.zh: 如果你能更有效地使用限定的时间

translation.en: more efficiently, you wouldn't be having this problem.

translation.en: - What do you want me to say? - That my plane is ready.

translation.en: Okay, listen.

translation.en: I promise you, as God is my witness,

translation.en: I'm working on it as hard as I can. It's just gonna take a few more hours.

translation.en: Why should I give you any more time?

translation.en: It's simple, you give me more time, you get what you want.
translation.zh: 很简单 你给我时间 你就能得到你想要的

translation.en: You don't give me the time, you don't get what you want.

translation.en: You got nothing to lose.

translation.en: Meanwhile, we'll send in some more food.

translation.en: I got a question for you. You get it right, I'll give you more time.

translation.en: - And? - You know what happens if you don't.
translation.zh: -什么？ -答不上来 你知道后果

translation.en: Which weighs more,

translation.en: all the trains that pass through Grand Central Station in a year

translation.en: or the trees cut down to print all US currency in circulation?

translation.en: Here's a hint-- it's a trick question.

translation.en: - ( dial tone ) - What the hell is that?

translation.en: - Playing games now? - Darius: It's the trains.
translation.zh: -这是什么鬼问题？ -现在是玩游戏？ 火车

translation.en: US money isn't printed on paper at all. It's cotton.
translation.zh: 美国货币已经不再用纸打印 用棉布

translation.en: - Yeah, that's right. - So no trees were cut down.
translation.zh: -没错 我听说了 -没错 -好吧 -所以 没有树被砍倒

translation.en: - Are you sure? - Yeah. 100%.
translation.zh: -你确定吗？ -百分之百

translation.en: - Okay. - ( dialing )
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: - I got it. - Wait a second. Wait a second.

translation.en: Call you back.
translation.zh: 我再给你打回来

translation.en: Mitchell: It's a trap. They both weigh the same.

translation.en: Tell him they both weigh the same. They both weigh nothing.

translation.en: They both weigh nothing or they both weigh the same?

translation.en: - Well? - They both weigh the same.

translation.en: This time send sandwiches.

translation.en: Pretty good. This guy's nuts.

translation.en: Grand Central Terminal is the train station.

translation.en: - Darius: He's wrong. - Who's wrong?

translation.en: What are you guys talking about? Hey hey hey hey!

translation.en: Let's just get the sandwiches.

translation.en: The deal is, he said, "passes through."
translation.zh: -地铁北线… -问题是 他说的是“经过”

translation.en: Yeah, but the Metro North goes up...
translation.zh: 但是北线通过那里

translation.en: Shut up! It doesn't matter anyway!
translation.zh: 闭嘴 这不重要了

translation.en: That's not what he meant. What he said was one thing,
translation.zh: 他说的话跟他的意思不同 我知道他的意思 他说的是一件事 但实际醉翁之意不在酒

translation.en: - but what he meant is another. - Darius: That's always a problem.
translation.zh: 他说的是一件事 但实际醉翁之意不在酒 一直有这问题

translation.en: - Frazier: Sandwiches. - Man: I'm on it.
translation.zh: -三明治 -我在准备

translation.en: Man: Right now, I could go for a nice kosher hot dog and a beer.
translation.zh: 现在我想吃犹太热狗 喝啤酒

translation.en: Man #2: I had Met tickets tonight, and Pedro's pitching.
translation.zh: 我今晚买了大都会棒球赛 佩德罗是投手 他们会输得很惨

translation.en: Woman: They're gonna get their asses kicked anyway.
translation.zh: 跟我讲讲 我在这里好多了

translation.en: - I'm better off here. - I'm glad they didn't separate us.
translation.zh: -我很高兴他们没将我们分开 -他们是恐怖分子吗？

translation.en: - Do you think they're terrorists? - Robbers, not terrorists.
translation.zh: -我很高兴他们没将我们分开 -他们是恐怖分子吗？ -他们是劫匪 不是恐怖分子 -你怎么知道？可能是基地组织

translation.en: How do you know? They could be Al Qaeda.
translation.zh: -他们是劫匪 不是恐怖分子 -你怎么知道？可能是基地组织

translation.en: Trust me. I've studied these things.
translation.zh: 相信我 我研究过这些东西

translation.en: - What are you, Mossad? - I was a lawyer.
translation.zh: -你是什么人 以色列情报局的吗？ -我是律师

translation.en: Now I teach courses at Columbia Law on genocide,
translation.zh: 我目前在哥伦比亚大学法学院 教大屠杀 奴役史课程

translation.en: slave labor, war reparation claims.
translation.zh: 我目前在哥伦比亚大学法学院 教大屠杀 奴役史课程 -还有战争赔款申请 -真棒

translation.en: - Can I sue anybody when this is over? - Oh, sure. Go nuts.
translation.zh: -还有战争赔款申请 -真棒 -这次抢劫结束后我能告什么人吗？ -当然 疯了吧

translation.en: Go meshuga.
translation.zh: 疯了

translation.en: Now, that's a good-looking shithole.
translation.zh: 这个洞看起来不错

translation.en: - Hello? - Hey, baby, how you doin'?
translation.zh: 喂？ （汉诺威大街）

translation.en: Baby, I'm worried about you. You coming home?
translation.zh: -亲爱的 你好吗？ -宝贝 我很担心你 你回家吗？

translation.en: Yeah yeah yeah. Soon.
translation.zh: 会的 很快

translation.en: I've got a long night, though, so don't wait up for me.
translation.zh: 不过今晚会是个长夜 -所以就别等我了 -你为什么不让我去？

translation.en: - Why don't you let me come? - Because I don't want to be distracted by you.
translation.zh: -所以就别等我了 -你为什么不让我去？ 因为我不想为你分心 就是这样

translation.en: Well, if you're still there when I come on duty in the morning, you will see me.
translation.zh: 如果你还在那里 明早我值班 你会见到我的

translation.en: - I cannot wait. I cannot wait. - So how you doing?
translation.zh: -我等不及了… -你还好吗？

translation.en: It's all right. We got a couple of the hostages out. Thanks a lot.
translation.zh: 还好 我们有几名人质出来了 万幸

translation.en: - No, no, how you doin'? - I'm doin' okay. I'm doin' all right.
translation.zh: 不 你怎么样？ 我还好 没事

translation.en: Oh, I saw the mayor on TV. He said you're doing a great job. I saw you too.
translation.zh: 我在电视上看到市长了 他说你很棒 -我也看到你了 -你在电视上看到我了？

translation.en: - You saw me on TV? - Yeah.
translation.zh: -我也看到你了 -你在电视上看到我了？ -没错 -我看起来如何？

translation.en: - How did I look? - Oh, you looked good, baby. Real good.
translation.zh: -很棒 亲爱的 很棒 -好吧 听着 我得挂电话了

translation.en: - Listen, I got to go. - All right. Hey.
translation.zh: -很棒 亲爱的 很棒 -好吧 听着 我得挂电话了 好的

translation.en: - Hmm? - Keep your head down. All right, I will. Love you.
translation.zh: -小心点 -好的 我会的 爱你

translation.en: So are we clear about the ground rules?
translation.zh: -基本原则都清楚了吗？ -别担心 警探

translation.en: - There's no need to worry. - I get paid to worry, okay?
translation.zh: -基本原则都清楚了吗？ -别担心 警探 警察必须担心 好吗？ 我只需要你看着我的眼睛

translation.en: I just need you to look me in the eye and make me believe
translation.zh: 警察必须担心 好吗？ 我只需要你看着我的眼睛

translation.en: that you understand everything we talked about.
translation.zh: 让我相信你理解我们所说的一切

translation.en: - I understand. - Okay.
translation.zh: -我理解 -很好 （我们永远记得）

translation.en: Someone here wants to talk to you.
translation.zh: 有人想跟你谈谈

translation.en: - Hello. - Who's this?
translation.zh: -喂？ -你是谁？

translation.en: Let's not get into any names. What matters is what I can offer you.
translation.zh: 名字就别提了吧 -重要的是我能提供给你的东西 -什么东西？

translation.en: - What's that? - If I can be sure certain interests are protected,
translation.zh: -重要的是我能提供给你的东西 -什么东西？ 如果你能保护一些利益

translation.en: I might be able to help you get what you came for.
translation.zh: 我就会帮你得到你需要的

translation.en: I doubt that. Tell me about these interests that you're trying to protect.
translation.zh: 我很怀疑 告诉我你想保护什么利益

translation.en: Why don't you let me worry about that? Now...
translation.zh: 这点就让我来操心 好吗？ 现在 你做这件事是什么目的？

translation.en: what was it you were hoping to get out of all this?
translation.zh: 现在 你做这件事是什么目的？

translation.en: - Rich, of course. - Of course.
translation.zh: -当然是变富翁 -当然

translation.en: But you may have bitten off more than you can chew.
translation.zh: 但是你可能贪多嚼不烂

translation.en: - How? - I can't discuss that on the phone.
translation.zh: -怎么说？ -电话里说不清楚

translation.en: - Do you work for the bank? - No.
translation.zh: -你替银行工作？ -不是

translation.en: - And you're not a cop? - That's right.
translation.zh: -也不是警察 -没错

translation.en: Come on in.
translation.zh: 进来吧

translation.en: You've got 10 minutes, no more.
translation.zh: （汉诺威大街） 你只有十分钟 不能再多 如果灯重新亮前你没有离开

translation.en: If you're not out before the lights come back on, you can stay inside till this is over.
translation.zh: 如果灯重新亮前你没有离开 那你就等整件事结束再出来吧

translation.en: - You don't need to threaten me. - That's not a threat, lady, but this is.
translation.zh: -你不用吓我 -那不是吓你 但这是玩真的

translation.en: I know this game is a mile over my head, but I'm telling you--
translation.zh: 我知道这整件事超出了我的理解范围 但如果你耍我 我告诉你

translation.en: I got where I am by collecting friends, not enemies. Trust me, okay?
translation.zh: 我能到今天这个地步 是交朋友而非树敌人得来的 相信我

translation.en: You're on your own.
translation.zh: 你自求多福吧

translation.en: What makes you think I need help?
translation.zh: 你为何觉得我需要帮助？

translation.en: Well, the 100 people outside, for starters.
translation.zh: 首先 外面有上百人

translation.en: - That's not a problem. - And they're fueling your jet right now as we speak.
translation.zh: 那不是问题 我们说话的时候 他们在给飞机加油

translation.en: ( chuckles ) Come on. You're not that stupid.
translation.zh: 拜托 你没那么蠢

translation.en: Here's what I'm thinking.
translation.zh: 我是这么想的

translation.en: If you give up now, I can assure that you serve the minimum.
translation.zh: 如果你现在放弃 我可以确保 你服最短的刑

translation.en: I'm thinking three years, four years at the most.
translation.zh: 我想最多三四年

translation.en: - You can arrange that? - Well, you haven't hurt anyone or stolen anything,
translation.zh: 这你也能安排？ 你没有伤害人 也没偷东西

translation.en: so, yes, as a matter of fact, I can.
translation.zh: 所以 实际上 我真的能

translation.en: - That's not good enough. - Well, I wasn't finished.
translation.zh: -还不够好 -我还没说完

translation.en: When you get out, you'll have $2 million. Will I? How?
translation.zh: -等你出来 能拿到二百万美元 -是吗？怎么说？

translation.en: We'll put it someplace safe. It'll be waiting for you when you get out.
translation.zh: 我们会把钱放在安全的地方 等你出来就能拿

translation.en: Thanks... but no, thanks.
translation.zh: 多谢 但是不用了

translation.en: Oh, come on.
translation.zh: 拜托 这个条件多诱人

translation.en: I made you such a sweet offer, I really don't think you have much in the way of alternatives.
translation.zh: 拜托 这个条件多诱人 我不觉得你有很多选择

translation.en: Why don't you talk to me about these interests that you're in here to protect?
translation.zh: 为何不告诉我 你要保护的是什么？

translation.en: - I'm afraid I can't. - I can. Let me tell you a story:
translation.zh: -抱歉我不能 -我能 我给你讲个故事

translation.en: During World War II, there was an American working for a bank in Switzerland.
translation.zh: 在二战期间 有个美国人 在一家瑞士银行工作

translation.en: Now I don't need to tell you that this period in history
translation.zh: 我不需要告诉你 这个历史时期

translation.en: was rife with opportunity for people with low morals, people like this man.
translation.zh: 对没什么道德的人来说 处处都是机会 人们非常喜欢他

translation.en: He used his position with the Nazis to enrich himself
translation.zh: （颁发给阿瑟卡斯 终生成就奖） 他利用自己的位置与纳粹合作 让自己暴富

translation.en: while all around him people were being stripped
translation.zh: 他利用自己的位置与纳粹合作 让自己暴富 而与此同时 他身边的人 被盘剥到一无所有

translation.en: of everything they owned.
translation.zh: 而与此同时 他身边的人 被盘剥到一无所有

translation.en: Then he used his blood money to start a bank.
translation.zh: 然后他用这笔沾满鲜血的钱 开了一家银行

translation.en: Now...
translation.zh: 现在

translation.en: does this sound like it might be the man you work for?
translation.zh: 你会不会是为这个人服务呢？

translation.en: Or am I just whistling "Dixie" out of my ass?
translation.zh: 还是我都是胡说八道呢？

translation.en: - I believe we understand each other. - Good.
translation.zh: -我相信我们了解彼此的意思 -很好

translation.en: So what the hell can you do for me,
translation.zh: 那么 在我显然知道的比你多 也做出了完美计划的情况下

translation.en: since I clearly know more than you do, and I've planned this to perfection?
translation.zh: 那么 在我显然知道的比你多 也做出了完美计划的情况下 你能为我做什么吗？

translation.en: Believe me, if I need to, I can change your entire program,
translation.zh: 相信我 如果需要 我能改变你的全盘计划

translation.en: so the sooner that you stop being my problem
translation.zh: 所以只要你别成为我的问题

translation.en: and you start becoming my solution, the better off you'll be.
translation.zh: 并且配合我 你就越富有

translation.en: - What is it you want? - Two minutes.
translation.zh: -你想干什么？ -两分钟

translation.en: The safety-deposit box room. I just need to go to one box.
translation.zh: 到存放保险箱的屋子里去 我只需要其中的一个

translation.en: Looking for this?
translation.zh: 在找这个？

translation.en: This could be very embarrassing to your employer.
translation.zh: 这可能会令你的主顾颜面扫地

translation.en: He should have destroyed this a long time ago. He didn't, so now it's mine.
translation.zh: 他应该早点销毁的 他没有 所以现在这就是我的

translation.en: Now if the day ever comes where I have to stand before a judge
translation.zh: 如果有一天我要站在法官面前

translation.en: and account for what I did here,
translation.zh: 解释我在这里做了什么

translation.en: you and your boss will do whatever it takes to help me.
translation.zh: 你和你的老板就会不惜一切救我

translation.en: You get out of here with that envelope
translation.zh: 你拿着这个信封出去 我们就给你很多钱

translation.en: - and we'll pay you a lot of money. - I'll keep that in mind.
translation.zh: 你拿着这个信封出去 我们就给你很多钱 我会考虑的

translation.en: You're not gonna tell me how you're planning to get out of here, are you?
translation.zh: 你不会告诉我你要怎么出去 对吧？

translation.en: I'm gonna walk right out the front door. Anything else?
translation.zh: 我就从正门出去 还有要说的吗？

translation.en: - How did you know about all this? - Doesn't matter.
translation.zh: -你是怎么知道这件事的？ -这不重要

translation.en: Fact is, all lies, all evil deeds, they stink.
translation.zh: 实际上 所有的谎言和恶行 都有恶臭

translation.en: You can cover them up for a while, but they don't go away.
translation.zh: 你可以掩盖一时 却无法掩盖一世

translation.en: - "Murder will out"? - Precisely.
translation.zh: -纸终究包不住火？ -没错

translation.en: Well, I still don't get what you're doing here.
translation.zh: 好吧 我还是不懂你在这里做什么

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: - So, we spoke. - Oh, no. You're gonna have to give me more than that.
translation.zh: -我们说完了 -不 你得给我更多信息

translation.en: - Let me have this window, fellas. - Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -让一下 -好的 长官

translation.en: I told him that, well, since he hadn't killed anyone,
translation.zh: 我告诉他 既然他没杀任何人

translation.en: it wasn't too late to surrender and get off with a lighter sentence.
translation.zh: 现在投降还不晚 能够有个轻一点的刑罚

translation.en: And? And that was basically it.
translation.zh: -还有？ -基本就是这些

translation.en: ( laughing ) You know, I don't ordinarily get offended
translation.zh: 一般来说 别人把我当傻子耍

translation.en: the first time somebody treats me like an idiot, but you are pushing it.
translation.zh: 我一般不会特别生气 但你得寸进尺了

translation.en: Now I know you did not go in there to tell this guy something he already knew.
translation.zh: 我知道你进去不会就为说几句 他也知道的话

translation.en: Talk to me.
translation.zh: -跟我说说 -听着 警探

translation.en: Look, our arrangement doesn't include me giving you an explanation.
translation.zh: 我们的协议是我不会对你做详细解释

translation.en: I say it does, okay?
translation.zh: 我认为需要 懂吗？

translation.en: You don't own me. This check-cashing thing,
translation.zh: 我可没被你收买 支票的事 我能自己应付

translation.en: this coke bust, I can face that on my own.
translation.zh: 支票的事 我能自己应付

translation.en: I know what I did and what I didn't do. Talk to me.
translation.zh: 我知道我做过什么 没做什么 -告诉我 -不记录在案？

translation.en: - Off the record? - Everything about you is off the record.
translation.zh: -告诉我 -不记录在案？ “不记录…”你说的一切 都不记录 告诉我就好

translation.en: Just talk to me.
translation.zh: “不记录…”你说的一切 都不记录 告诉我就好

translation.en: - Well, I gave him an incentive. - Okay. Did he go for it?
translation.zh: -我开了一个条件给他 -很好 -他愿意吗？ -不 但他在考虑

translation.en: No, but I'd say he's considering it.
translation.zh: -他愿意吗？ -不 但他在考虑

translation.en: He's smart, isn't he?
translation.zh: 他很聪明 对吗？

translation.en: - He thinks he is. - Yeah.
translation.zh: -他觉得自己很聪明 -没错

translation.en: One of your types? Like, Ivy-League type?
translation.zh: 就是你们这种常青藤联盟毕业的？

translation.en: - Clearly well educated. - That's what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: -很显然受过良好教育 -我就是这个意思

translation.en: That's exactly what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 就是这个意思

translation.en: You talk like him, so think like him. What do you think he's gonna do?
translation.zh: 你说话像他一样 所以像他一样思考 你觉得他会做什么？

translation.en: - Well, he's not gonna kill anyone. - How do you know?
translation.zh: -他不会杀人 -你怎么知道？

translation.en: - Because he's not a murderer. - How do you know?
translation.zh: -因为他不是杀人犯 -你怎么知道？

translation.en: I got news for you. Most of the guys up in Sing Sing
translation.zh: 我告诉你 关在新新监狱的人

translation.en: weren't murderers until they killed somebody.
translation.zh: 在杀人之前也都不是杀人犯

translation.en: You never know what a person'll do until you push him into a corner.
translation.zh: 在把人逼到墙角前 你都不知道他能做出什么事

translation.en: But it doesn't seem like you've pushed him into a corner.
translation.zh: 但看起来你并没有把他逼到墙角

translation.en: It doesn't, does it?
translation.zh: 但看起来你并没有把他逼到墙角 没有 对吧？更像是他自找的

translation.en: Seems more like he chose the corner.
translation.zh: 没有 对吧？更像是他自找的

translation.en: You're right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: So, you through?
translation.zh: 所以你的事情办完了吗？

translation.en: - I guess. You saying I'm dismissed? - Yes, I am.
translation.zh: -我想是的 你是说我得走人了？ -没错

translation.en: You got a card in case I need to call you?
translation.zh: 有名片吗？说不定需要打给你

translation.en: Well, please don't take this personally, but no, I don't think you could afford me.
translation.zh: 别往心里去 但我不能给 你付不起我的劳务费

translation.en: Well, don't take this personally, Miss White. Kiss my black ass, okay?
translation.zh: 别往心里去 但我不能给 你付不起我的劳务费 你也别往心里去 魏特女士 快滚吧 行吗？

translation.en: Careful, Detective Frazier. My bite's much worse than my bark.
translation.zh: 小心说话 费雷泽警探 被我咬一口可就疼得多了

translation.en: - So how old are you, Brian? - Eight and three quarters.
translation.zh: -你多大了？布莱恩 -八又四分之三

translation.en: Eight and three quarters?
translation.zh: 八又四分之三 大男孩

translation.en: Big boy. Were you scared in there?
translation.zh: 八又四分之三 大男孩 -在里面害怕吗？ -不害怕

translation.en: - Nah. - No? Not at all, huh?
translation.zh: -在里面害怕吗？ -不害怕 -不怕？一点都不？ -不怕 我来自布鲁克林区

translation.en: - Nope. I'm from Brooklyn. - You're from Brooklyn, huh?
translation.zh: -不怕？一点都不？ -不怕 我来自布鲁克林区 -你来自布鲁克林？懂了 -我不害怕枪

translation.en: - Guns don't scare me. - That don't scare you? Brave too, huh?
translation.zh: -你来自布鲁克林？懂了 -我不害怕枪 -他们没吓你？很勇敢啊？ -是的

translation.en: - Yeah. - So the guys that had the guns,
translation.zh: -他们没吓你？很勇敢啊？ -是的 那些拿着枪的人 你还记得他们说什么吗？

translation.en: do you remember them saying anything?
translation.zh: 那些拿着枪的人 你还记得他们说什么吗？

translation.en: - Yeah. - What'd they say?
translation.zh: -记得 -他们说什么？

translation.en: - They asked me about my game. - Who did?
translation.zh: 问我游戏的事 -谁问的？ -当然是抢银行的人啊

translation.en: The guy that robbed the bank. Duh.
translation.zh: -谁问的？ -当然是抢银行的人啊

translation.en: - Son, be respectful. - Okay, Brooklyn. But was he the one in charge?
translation.zh: 孩子 态度端正点 布鲁克林的孩子 他是头儿吗？

translation.en: - Uh-huh. - Okay.
translation.zh: -是的 -好吧

translation.en: And you don't remember anything else?
translation.zh: 你不记得其他的了？

translation.en: He was kind of tall. He had a mask.
translation.zh: 他挺高的 戴着面具

translation.en: Right. Do you think you can recognize him in any of these pictures?
translation.zh: 布莱恩 能从这些照片中认出他吗？

translation.en: Take your time. Have a good look.
translation.zh: 不着急 慢慢看

translation.en: Take a look.
translation.zh: 把这些都放在这里 仔细看看

translation.en: - With the masks, they look all the same. - It's true.
translation.zh: -戴着面具 看上去都一样 -没错

translation.en: With the masks, they all look the same. That's right, Brian.
translation.zh: 戴面具的话看上去都一样

translation.en: Mitchell: Attempted robbery: liquor store.
translation.zh: 酒类商店抢劫未遂

translation.en: Well, this was a real step up for a small-timer like you, huh?
translation.zh: 抢银行对你们来说 算是很大的进步了 对吧？

translation.en: I got to hand it to you, Pablo.
translation.zh: 你真有一套 帕博洛

translation.en: First of all, it's Paul, not Pablo, okay?
translation.zh: 首先 我叫保罗 不是帕博洛 懂吗？

translation.en: Excuse me. Want some gum?
translation.zh: 抱歉 你吃口香糖吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不 其次 不是我做的 懂吗？

translation.en: I didn't do it, all right? I made a few mistakes when I was a kid.
translation.zh: 不 其次 不是我做的 懂吗？ 怎么？我还小的时候犯过错

translation.en: I was out with some friends and they held up a liquor store.
translation.zh: 我和朋友在外面 他们抢了一家酒类商店

translation.en: What was I supposed to do?
translation.zh: 我能怎么办？

translation.en: Where did you grow up, you "wasa-wasa"? Park Avenue?
translation.zh: 你在哪里长大？ 有钱人？派克大街上的？

translation.en: What's that? Wassa-what? What'd he say? Wasa-wasa. ( speaks Spanish )
translation.zh: -什么？有什么？你说什么？ -有钱人

translation.en: You know, a person that don't come to your neighborhood.
translation.zh: 一看你就不像的那种有钱人

translation.en: How do you say "Rikers Island" in Spanish?
translation.zh: “克岛监狱”西班牙语怎么说？

translation.en: What about these two? That ring a bell?
translation.zh: 这两个人呢？ -有印象吗？ -这两人？没有

translation.en: - These two? - Mmm.
translation.zh: -有印象吗？ -这两人？没有

translation.en: - No. - Nothing?
translation.zh: -有印象吗？ -这两人？没有 -完全没有？ -没有

translation.en: - Nothing. - Don't they look suspicious to you?
translation.zh: -没有 -他们看着可疑吗？ 我想你应该想知道他们是谁

translation.en: I mean, I would think that you would want to know who they are.
translation.zh: 我想你应该想知道他们是谁

translation.en: - No. - Well, thank you very much.
translation.zh: -不 -好吧 谢谢你 谢谢

translation.en: Hey, just out of curiosity, do you know anything about diamonds?
translation.zh: 出于好奇问一句 你对钻石知道多少？

translation.en: Ah, a bit. What do you need?
translation.zh: 一点吧 你需要什么？

translation.en: What do you think a guy like me should pay for a diamond ring?
translation.zh: 你觉得我这样的人 能买得起什么样的钻戒？

translation.en: Depends. How many carats? If you like, I could give you my nephew's number.
translation.zh: 看情况 多少克拉？ 如果你喜欢 我把我侄子的电话给你 -好的 -你会买到很划算的

translation.en: - You'll get a very good deal. - What do you have on underneath?
translation.zh: -好的 -你会买到很划算的 -你们在下面穿什么？ -你说什么？

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.zh: -你们在下面穿什么？ -你说什么？

translation.en: Underneath your painter's coat. What do you have on underneath?
translation.zh: 在油漆工衣服下面穿什么？ 你下面穿什么？

translation.en: - Clothing. - Could you show us, please?
translation.zh: -衣服 -能给我们看看吗？

translation.en: You see, there's just you and one other woman
translation.zh: 只有你和另一个女子符合

translation.en: that fit the physical description of the female suspect.
translation.zh: 只有你和另一个女子符合 女性疑犯的体征描述

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: That's your height, your age, - and your, um... - Your cup size.
translation.zh: -你的身高 年龄和… -罩杯

translation.en: So I violated section 34-DD? That's what you're telling me?
translation.zh: 所以我罩杯大就犯法了？ 你们是这个意思？

translation.en: How dumb do these morons have to be to think they're gonna get a plane?
translation.zh: 这些蠢货得多傻 才觉得自己会得到飞机？

translation.en: - This guy's no moron. - I don't just mean him. Any hostage-taker.
translation.zh: -他们才不傻 -我不只是说他 所有挟持人质的人

translation.en: Those ragheads at the Munich Olympics? Who the fuck ever got a plane?
translation.zh: 慕尼黑奥运会那些恐怖分子 谁得到飞机了？

translation.en: Shit, and these days? This guy don't know that?
translation.zh: 该死 现在呢？他们还不知道？

translation.en: - What you doin', there, Keith? - He wants a plane, I'm gonna give him a plane.
translation.zh: 现在整条街都被警察布下防线 你在干嘛？凯斯 他想要飞机 就给他一架

translation.en: - What happened to playing it by the book? - That's what's bugging me.
translation.zh: -你不遵守谈判手册？ -这正是让我心烦之处

translation.en: It's like the other team read the book too, and they know exactly what we're gonna do.
translation.zh: 他们好像也读过教科书 知道接下来我们要做什么

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 怎么会？

translation.en: This whole time, we're trying to stall him, right?
translation.zh: 这段时间我们在试图拖住他 对吧？

translation.en: Wrong. They're the ones that's stalling.
translation.zh: 错 他们才在拖延时间

translation.en: Think about it-- the bullshit questions, the Albanian thing.
translation.zh: 想想 可笑的问题 阿尔巴尼亚录音带

translation.en: - So you're saying-- - I'm saying that he wants to give us more time.
translation.zh: 所以你说他是？ 我说他想多给我们点时间 他做出了要求

translation.en: He makes demands. He gives us deadlines.
translation.zh: 我说他想多给我们点时间 他做出了要求 给出了截止时间 我们拖时间 他又给了我们时间

translation.en: We stall, then he gives us more time.
translation.zh: 给出了截止时间 我们拖时间 他又给了我们时间

translation.en: - I don't think he's in a rush. - Why?
translation.zh: -我想他不着急 -为什么？

translation.en: That's what I'm gonna find out.
translation.zh: 这是我要弄明白的

translation.en: - Yeah. - Your plane is ready.
translation.zh: -喂 -你的飞机准备好了

translation.en: - Is that a fact? - That's a fact.
translation.zh: 是吗？ 没错 但我需要你先提供一些东西

translation.en: But I'm gonna need to come in there
translation.zh: 没错 但我需要你先提供一些东西 我要进去确保人质安全

translation.en: and make sure the hostages are okay.
translation.zh: 我要进去确保人质安全

translation.en: You'll see them when they get on the bus.
translation.zh: 等他们上公交时 你会看到他们

translation.en: I just need to make sure you're not leaving any bodies behind.
translation.zh: 我只需要确保你没留下尸体

translation.en: Meet me at the front door.
translation.zh: 在前门见我

translation.en: - What the hell just happened? - You got to be crazy to go in there.
translation.zh: -刚刚发生了什么？ -你疯了才会去那里

translation.en: Down the stairs.
translation.zh: 下楼梯

translation.en: - Gum? - Excuse me?
translation.zh: -口香糖？ -什么？

translation.en: - Would you like some gum? - No, thank you.
translation.zh: -你吃口香糖吗？ -不了 谢谢

translation.en: Let me take the kid.
translation.zh: 让我带走孩子

translation.en: No. Any more?
translation.zh: -不行 -还有吗？

translation.en: There are some who misbehaved.
translation.zh: 还有些不老实的

translation.en: ( muffled shouts, sobs )
translation.zh: 请救救我 -救命 -求你 救救我们

translation.en: I'm gonna get you all out of here. I promise you.
translation.zh: 我们会把你们救出去的 我保证

translation.en: The tour's over.
translation.zh: 参观结束

translation.en: - Can I ask you a question? - There's nothing to talk about.
translation.zh: -我能问你个问题吗？ -没什么可说的

translation.en: What were you planning on doing if you actually got the plane and the pilots, huh?
translation.zh: 如果你有飞机和飞行员 你打算怎么做呢？

translation.en: - Excuse me? - You don't want a plane. You never did.
translation.zh: -什么？ -你不想要飞机 压根不想

translation.en: Whoever heard of bank robbers escaping on a plane with 50 hostages?
translation.zh: 谁听过银行劫匪带着50个人质 坐飞机逃跑的事？

translation.en: You saw Dog Day Afternoon. You're stalling. Why, I don't know.
translation.zh: 你看过《热天午后》 你在拖延时间 原因是为什么？我不得而知

translation.en: What's the matter? You can't get into the safe?
translation.zh: 什么问题？你打不开保险箱？

translation.en: - Perhaps. - Ah. There's two ways out of this.
translation.zh: -或许 -有两种解决办法

translation.en: The easy way, we walk out the front door together, or the hard boys cut the power,
translation.zh: 简单的是我们一起从前门出去 或者让我们的硬汉们切断电源

translation.en: hit you with the tear gas and come in strong through the glass.
translation.zh: 扔着催泪瓦斯 带着防暴盾牌 强行闯入

translation.en: It's your choice. You don't want that. I don't want that.
translation.zh: 你来选 你不想要后一种 我也不想

translation.en: And you know, they'd like to do it tonight.
translation.zh: 你知道 他们今晚就要行动了

translation.en: You got night vision? You got gas masks?
translation.zh: 你们有夜视镜吗？ -有防催泪弹面具吗？ -或许

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.zh: -有防催泪弹面具吗？ -或许

translation.en: - I'm this close to ordering it. - Let's cut the crap.
translation.zh: -我离下令就差一点了 -少说废话

translation.en: First, you don't order an assault when no hostages have been killed
translation.zh: 首先 在没有人质死亡情况下 你不能发动袭击

translation.en: and there's no immediate threat.
translation.zh: 而现在没什么迫切威胁

translation.en: Second, if it ends that way, whatever happens, you don't get to be the hero.
translation.zh: 其次 如果事情这样结束 不论发生什么 你都不是英雄

translation.en: You want to bullshit me, try harder.
translation.zh: 想骗我 再努力点

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I'll tell you what: My ass is covered, sport.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 我不会有什么麻烦

translation.en: But I would not get too comfortable in there if I were you.
translation.zh: 但如果我是你 我在这里也不会太舒服

translation.en: No? I got the cable guy coming on Wednesday.
translation.zh: 是吗？我周三约了修电视的人

translation.en: ( chuckles ) Why don't you just walk out the door? I will.
translation.zh: -你干嘛不直接走出去呢？ -我会的

translation.en: I'm gonna walk out of that door when I'm good and ready.
translation.zh: 我准备好了自然会走出去

translation.en: Can I get you to do that today?
translation.zh: 我能让你今天就这么做吗？

translation.en: - I didn't think so. - Any other proposals?
translation.zh: -我想不行 -还有其他提议吗？

translation.en: Oh, please, do not say "proposals."
translation.zh: 拜托 别说什么“提议”

translation.en: My girlfriend, she wants a proposal from me.
translation.zh: 我的女朋友还想让我求婚呢

translation.en: You think you're too young to get married?
translation.zh: 你觉得你太年轻了 所以不想结婚？

translation.en: No, not too young, too broke. Maybe I should rob a bank.
translation.zh: 不 我不年轻 太穷而已 或许我该抢银行

translation.en: Do you love each other? Yeah. Yeah, we do.
translation.zh: -你们相爱吗？ -当然

translation.en: Then money shouldn't really matter.
translation.zh: 那钱不该是问题

translation.en: Thank you, bank robber. I'm just saying... money can't buy love.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 银行劫匪 -我只是说钱买不来爱

translation.en: Thank you... very much. I'm-- I'm learning so much today, you know?
translation.zh: 谢谢你 我…我今天学到很多

translation.en: Look, why don't we go across the street to the Killarney Rose, huh?
translation.zh: 听着 我们干脆走过马路 去对面的吉拉尼玫瑰店吧？

translation.en: Forget about this dangerous hostage situation.
translation.zh: 忘记现在这个危险的人质挟持事件

translation.en: - I'll buy you a beer, my treat. - Thanks, Detective,
translation.zh: -我给你买瓶啤酒 我请客 -谢谢 警探

translation.en: but, uh, I'm trying to stay away from bars, if you know what I mean.
translation.zh: 但我要离酒吧远点 如果你懂我的意思

translation.en: Well, if you change your mind, there's still a standing offer, all right?
translation.zh: 如果你改主意了 还有机会的 好吗？

translation.en: Cell block or the graveyard? Prison whites or a toe tag?
translation.zh: 蹲监狱还是直接去墓地？ 当囚犯还是尸体？

translation.en: - Make up your mind! Ticktock, ticktock. - Hey! Hey!
translation.zh: -快决定吧 时间不等人 -喂…

translation.en: - ( weapon cocks ) - We done?
translation.zh: 完了没？

translation.en: You just crossed the fucking line.
translation.zh: 你过线了

translation.en: Buses, Kojak, parked outside. You think I'm bluffing,
translation.zh: 大侦探 公交停外面 你以为我吓唬你？

translation.en: you roll the dice and see what happens.
translation.zh: 那你就等着瞧吧

translation.en: - So what's up? - Got him right where I want him.
translation.zh: 好了 举起盾牌 -怎么样？ -我让他上钩了

translation.en: - Yeah? Where's that? - Right behind me with my pants around my ankles,
translation.zh: 是吗？怎么说？ 他钳住了我的脚踝 但这才开始

translation.en: - but it's a start. - Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 他钳住了我的脚踝 但这才开始 老天

translation.en: - What the fuck, man? He got the drop on you. - How long?
translation.zh: -什么情况？老兄 -多久？ -两小时？ -他把你扑倒了

translation.en: - What if he saw your face? What if I didn't have my gun? - Two, maybe three hours.
translation.zh: -多久？ -看到你脸怎么办？ -两到三个小时 -如果我没拿枪怎么办？

translation.en: You know, you're letting this cop get too fucking close.
translation.zh: 你让警察太接近了

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 发生了什么？

translation.en: I gave him every excuse to blow my brains out.
translation.zh: 我给了他所有可以轰掉我脑袋的理由

translation.en: He doesn't bite. Why? He ain't the type.
translation.zh: 他却没下手 为什么？他不是杀手

translation.en: Let's just sit back and think about this for a second.
translation.zh: 让我们退回来好好想想

translation.en: We know that they planned this whole thing-- the tape, the cameras, the costumes.
translation.zh: 我们知道他们策划了整件事 录音带 摄像头 服装

translation.en: There was a game plan, but it never included airplanes.
translation.zh: 录音带 摄像头 服装 他们有个计划 但肯定不包括飞机

translation.en: He's up to something, but it ain't violence.
translation.zh: 他想干什么 却不是暴力的

translation.en: - I'm listening. How's the reception?
translation.zh: -我在听 -信号好吗？

translation.en: - Excuse me? - The camera on the truck.
translation.zh: -什么？ -车里的摄像头

translation.en: Give me a close-up on the second-floor window.
translation.zh: 给二楼窗户来个特写镜头

translation.en: - Walt. - I'm on it, I'm on it.
translation.zh: -鲁克尔？ -马上…

translation.en: - No no no no no! Oh, fuck! - Shit.
translation.zh: -不…该死 -该死

translation.en: Keith! Keith! - Keith! - ( cops chattering )
translation.zh: 凯斯…

translation.en: What are you doing? What the fuck are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？你要干嘛？

translation.en: You mean beyond the obvious?
translation.zh: 还不够明显吗？

translation.en: That's what I mean. Come on, this ain't no bank robbery!
translation.zh: 我就这意思 根本没什么银行劫案

translation.en: This is your fault. I told you to get the buses.
translation.zh: 这是你的错 我让你去弄公交的

translation.en: Fuck you! I didn't kill anybody!
translation.zh: 你去死吧 我没杀任何人

translation.en: I've got 50 more people in here.
translation.zh: 我这里还有50个人质 你再玩我

translation.en: You fuck with me again, I'll give you two of the longest days of your life.
translation.zh: 我这里还有50个人质 你再玩我 我就让你过一下人生中 最为漫长的两天

translation.en: Right, all right. Look, just tell me what it is
translation.zh: 我就让你过一下人生中 最为漫长的两天 好吧 告诉我你到底想要什么 我去帮你办

translation.en: you really want, and I'll get it for you, I promise.
translation.zh: 好吧 告诉我你到底想要什么 我去帮你办 -我保证 -我告诉你了 两辆公交 一架飞机

translation.en: I've told you: two buses, a plane.
translation.zh: -我保证 -我告诉你了 两辆公交 一架飞机

translation.en: Right right right. And box seats behind home plate at Yankee Stadium.
translation.zh: 好吧 还有洋基体育场 贵宾包厢票

translation.en: Come on. Don't bullshit a bullshitter.
translation.zh: 快点 别再糊弄我

translation.en: You planned every inch of this thing right from the start,
translation.zh: 你从一开始就策划好了一切

translation.en: and you got everybody marching to your beat, including me, and I'm through buying it.
translation.zh: 你让所有人跟上你的节奏 包括我 我不再受你摆布了

translation.en: You're too damn smart to be a cop.
translation.zh: 你太聪明不适合做警察

translation.en: - Now, get the fuck out of here. - You gonna shoot me?
translation.zh: -现在 给我出去 -怎么？你要打死我？

translation.en: Do it. Shit, you got nothing to lose. I damn sure got nothing to lose.
translation.zh: 快来吧 你也没什么损失 我很确定 所以你开枪吧

translation.en: So shoot me. Do it.
translation.zh: 我很确定 所以你开枪吧

translation.en: - Shoot me. - Fuck you.
translation.zh: -开枪 -去死

translation.en: Tell 'em to send someone sane over here.
translation.zh: 让警察派个正常人来

translation.en: - Man: Hello? - We got a big problem.
translation.zh: -什么？ -我们遇到大问题了

translation.en: Hey, Detective, this ain't your day.
translation.zh: 警探 今天不是你的好日子

translation.en: How you doin', Captain?
translation.zh: 您好吗？警长

translation.en: - Look, I know you put your trust in me, and I... - Well, you're a good cop.
translation.zh: 我知道你信任我 我只是… 你是个好警察 费雷泽 我需要更多你这样的人

translation.en: I need more like you. But if you're going down on this one, I can't go with you.
translation.zh: 你是个好警察 费雷泽 我需要更多你这样的人 但如果你继续深入这个案件 我恐怕不能同意

translation.en: - You've got to understand-- - No no no no.
translation.zh: 但你必须理解 先生

translation.en: Let me just tell you what my problem is. Okay?
translation.zh: 不 让我告诉你我的问题 好吗？

translation.en: I go to bed, everything's hunky-dory,
translation.zh: 我去睡觉时一切正常

translation.en: I get a call at 3:15 and there's, what, a dead hostage.
translation.zh: 凌晨3点15分接到电话 发生了什么？人质死亡

translation.en: - Right right right. But I can end this thing... - It is ended.
translation.zh: -没错 但我能处理此事 -已经结束了

translation.en: See, you think I got options. I got to answer to the Chief of Ds.
translation.zh: 你觉得我有选择吗？ 我得去向警察局局长汇报

translation.en: Darius is calling the shots on this. That's it.
translation.zh: 现在行动由达鲁斯说了算 就这样

translation.en: - What'd he say? - That's it.
translation.zh: -他说什么？ -就这样

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: - It's a tactical nightmare. - I know.
translation.zh: -真是战术上的噩梦 -我知道

translation.en: First, this is the only way in.
translation.zh: 首先 这是唯一的入口

translation.en: Then we got to make it up the stairs blind.
translation.zh: 我们要摸黑上去

translation.en: Once we get up there, we're right out in the open.
translation.zh: 我们一上去就全部暴露在外了

translation.en: They have the advantage of cover. They can pick us off like sitting ducks.
translation.zh: 他们有优势可以先找掩体 很容易地将我们干掉

translation.en: And if we make it across the floor and down the stairs,
translation.zh: 下楼也是一样的

translation.en: we still can't tell the homies from the good guys until they shoot at us.
translation.zh: 除非他们射击 否则我们也分辨不出谁是歹徒

translation.en: Even if it isn't rigged with explosives, it's still a fucking nightmare.
translation.zh: 就算没有炸弹 但这还是个噩梦

translation.en: - Move! Move! Move! - Open the door!
translation.zh: 行动… 开门…

translation.en: - Man: Move it! - Man #2: Watch the hands!
translation.zh: -快点 -去右边 小心手…

translation.en: Let's not forget the possibility of hostages being killed.
translation.zh: 别忘了人质可能被射杀 现在 放下枪

translation.en: Darius: Well, our best hope is to separate the hostages.
translation.zh: 我们最好的希望是将他们和人质分开

translation.en: - If we can get two or three upstairs and take 'em out. - Kill 'em.
translation.zh: 如果我们能把两三个歹徒弄到楼上 把他们结果？ 杀了他们？

translation.en: Gun gun gun!
translation.zh: 枪…

translation.en: What if there's more than four? Yeah, well, that's what's so nuts about it.
translation.zh: -如果不止四个人呢？ -这就是让人发疯的地方

translation.zh: -库格林不是让我们翻篇吗？ -走吧

translation.en: Thank you again, Your Honor. I'll pick it up tomorrow?
translation.zh: 再次感谢 法官 我明天来取？

translation.en: - Yes, you're welcome. - Thank you.
translation.zh: -没错 不客气 -谢谢

translation.en: What are you doing, Detective? What business do you have with Judge Pasqua?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？警探 你和帕斯夸法官有什么事情要谈？

translation.en: - Police business. - Weren't you told to bury this?
translation.zh: 警方的事情 -不是让你别管了吗？ -我有工作要做 魏特女士

translation.en: I've got a job to do, Miss White.
translation.zh: -不是让你别管了吗？ -我有工作要做 魏特女士

translation.en: And since when is your job more important than your career?
translation.zh: 什么时候你的工作比前途还重要了？

translation.en: - Did you forget our arrangement? - We didn't have an arrangement.
translation.zh: -还是你忘了我们的协议？ -我们没有协议

translation.en: - Let me tell you how this works. - No, let me tell you
translation.zh: 我告诉你怎么做 不 我来告诉你

translation.en: how this works.
translation.zh: 不 我来告诉你

translation.en: You press here to record and you press here to play.
translation.zh: 按这里录音 按这里播放

translation.en: Madeline's voice: There's also the little matter of the $140,000
translation.zh: 你侦办的贩毒案

translation.en: that seems to have walked away from the Madrugada check-cashing bust.
translation.zh: 有一张十四万美元的支票不见了

translation.en: Keith's voice: I didn't have anything to do with that,
translation.zh: 我和此事没有关系 所以…

translation.en: so you got to be in your court on that.
translation.zh: 我们可以帮你

translation.en: Exchange for what? You want me to do something unethical?
translation.zh: 用什么交换？ 想让我做点不道德的事吗？

translation.en: I mean, no disrespect to the both of you,
translation.zh: 不是冒犯二位

translation.en: but I don't need you to be in my corner, Mr. Mayor.
translation.zh: 我没什么需要你们支持我的 包括市长先生

translation.en: I'm innocent.
translation.zh: 我是无辜的

translation.en: Madeline's voice: Innocent or guilty, you're still going down.
translation.zh: 不管是否无辜 你还是会倒霉

translation.en: Mayor: Give Miss White whatever she needs or your career is over.
translation.zh: 给魏特女士她想要的 不然你的事业就完蛋

translation.en: Done. Kaput.
translation.zh: 结束了 完了

translation.en: - ( clicks off ) - So...
translation.zh: 所以呢？你给我我想要的

translation.en: you gave me what I wanted, your career is blossoming
translation.zh: 所以呢？你给我我想要的 你的事业就节节高升 一切都没问题

translation.en: and all is right with the world.
translation.zh: 你的事业就节节高升 一切都没问题

translation.en: What was Case hiding?
translation.zh: 卡斯到底在藏着什么？

translation.en: You know, there's a famous saying by the Baron de Rothschild:
translation.zh: 罗斯柴尔德爵士说过一句名言

translation.en: "When there's blood in the streets, buy property."
translation.zh: “街上发生血案 置办房产”

translation.en: I think Mr. Case really took that sentiment to heart,
translation.zh: 我想卡斯先生一定非常赞同这观点

translation.en: but he is no different than half the Fortune 500.
translation.zh: 但他和世界500强的企业家没区别

translation.en: Let it go, Detective.
translation.zh: 放手吧 警探

translation.en: You're a good cop.
translation.zh: 你是个好警察

translation.en: The city needs you.
translation.zh: 纽约需要你

translation.en: Lady! Lady, you're in the wrong place! I have an appointment.
translation.zh: -女士 你走错了地方 -我有约

translation.en: Arthur. Good morning.
translation.zh: 阿瑟 -早上好 -魏特女士

translation.en: Ah, Miss White.
translation.zh: -早上好 -魏特女士

translation.en: Have a seat.
translation.zh: 请坐

translation.en: Thank you, Vincent. That's all for now. Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 文森特 就这样吧 谢谢

translation.en: Well, what did he say?
translation.zh: 他怎么说？

translation.en: Well, Detective Frazier turned out to be quite sharp,
translation.zh: 费雷泽警探很犀利

translation.en: but I just fast-tracked his career a little, and he's under control.
translation.zh: 我快速调查了他的职业背景 他已经处于控制之下

translation.en: I hope so. Tell me about the envelope.
translation.zh: 希望如此 告诉我信封的事

translation.en: - Where is it now? - Well, the gang leader is going to hang onto it
translation.zh: 它在哪？ 劫匪首领想一直拿着它

translation.en: as an insurance policy to keep you from seeking revenge.
translation.zh: 作为保险 以防你向他复仇

translation.en: Clearly, he has a very low opinion of you.
translation.zh: 显然 他很看不上你

translation.en: - And what might that be? - Well, let's see. In a nutshell,
translation.zh: 那会是什么？ 简单来说 就是你有钱了

translation.en: um, that you got rich doing business with the Nazis
translation.zh: 简单来说 就是你有钱了 是因为在大屠杀期间和纳粹做生意

translation.en: during the Holocaust.
translation.zh: 是因为在大屠杀期间和纳粹做生意

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: It was 60 years ago. I was young and ambitious.
translation.zh: 那是60年前 我年轻有野心

translation.en: I saw a short path to success and I took it.
translation.zh: 看到了成功的捷径 就走了上去

translation.en: I sold my soul,
translation.zh: 出卖了灵魂

translation.en: and I've been trying to buy it back ever since.
translation.zh: 那以后我一直试着把它买回来

translation.en: But you and this mystery man, you have an understanding?
translation.zh: 但你和这个神秘人 达成了共识？

translation.en: I think so, but he managed to get out of there with that envelope.
translation.zh: 我想是的 他想方设法带着信封逃了

translation.en: If someday he comes back to blackmail you,
translation.zh: 如果某天他回来敲诈你

translation.en: well, you'll pay him
translation.zh: 如果某天他回来敲诈你 你得给他钱 然后把信封拿回来

translation.en: and you'll get it back.
translation.zh: 你得给他钱 然后把信封拿回来

translation.en: - So I guess that's it. - I suppose so.
translation.zh: -所以这件事情就这样了 -我想是的

translation.en: - Bullshit. - I beg your pardon?
translation.zh: -胡说 -什么？

translation.en: He didn't go through all that just to stick your envelope under his mattress.
translation.zh: 他做着一切才不是为了拿走你的信封 把它藏在床垫下

translation.en: Look, they left money untouched, Arthur.
translation.zh: -他们没动钱 阿瑟 -所以呢？

translation.en: - So? - So,
translation.zh: -他们没动钱 阿瑟 -所以呢？ 所以他出去的时候肯定拿了别的

translation.en: he had to have walked out of there with something else.
translation.zh: 所以他出去的时候肯定拿了别的

translation.en: The bank says that there was nothing missing,
translation.zh: 银行说没有失窃

translation.en: so there had to have been something in that box
translation.zh: 所以肯定是保险箱里的东西

translation.en: that was worth more to him than your envelope.
translation.zh: 对他来说比你的信封更重要

translation.en: You don't have to tell me. There's only one thing it could be, anyway.
translation.zh: 你不必告诉我 只可能是一个东西

translation.en: Diamonds.
translation.zh: 钻石

translation.en: And then there's the ring. A Cartier ring.
translation.zh: 还有戒指 卡地亚的戒指

translation.en: It belonged to the wife of a Parisian banker,
translation.zh: 是一个巴黎银行家妻子的

translation.en: a wealthy family of French Jews.
translation.zh: 富有的法国犹太人

translation.en: And when the war came along, the ring
translation.zh: 战争发生时 戒指和他们的一切

translation.en: and everything else they owned was confiscated,
translation.zh: 战争发生时 戒指和他们的一切 都被没收 他们被送到集中营 无人生还

translation.en: and they were shipped off to concentration camps. None survived.
translation.zh: 都被没收 他们被送到集中营 无人生还

translation.en: We were friends. I could have helped them.
translation.zh: 我们曾是朋友 我本来能帮他们

translation.en: But the Nazis paid too well.
translation.zh: 但纳粹给的钱太多了

translation.en: Can I trust that you will keep
translation.zh: 我能够信任你会把你今天了解到的

translation.en: what you learned here today
translation.zh: 我能够信任你会把你今天了解到的 都保密吗？

translation.en: confidential,
translation.zh: 都保密吗？

translation.en: despite whatever you may think?
translation.zh: 不管你怎么想？

translation.en: Yes, Arthur.
translation.zh: 可以 阿瑟

translation.en: Well, I'd love to tell you what a monster you are,
translation.zh: 我想告诉你你是个魔鬼

translation.en: but I have to help Bin Laden's nephew buy a co-op on Park Avenue.
translation.zh: 但我还得帮本拉登的侄子 在派克大街买房子

translation.en: Ah, if that were true, you wouldn't tell me. We're listing you as a reference.
translation.zh: -如果那是真的 你不会告诉我 -我们把你列为推荐人

translation.en: My name is Dalton Russell.
translation.zh: 我叫达尔顿拉塞尔

translation.en: Pay strict attention to what I say
translation.zh: 仔细注意听我说

translation.en: because I choose my words carefully, and I never repeat myself.
translation.zh: 因为我是字斟句酌的 而且我绝不会说第二遍

translation.en: I've told you my name. That's the who.
translation.zh: 已经告诉过你们我的名字 回答了“谁”的问题

translation.en: The where could be most readily described as a prison cell,
translation.zh: 至于我“在哪里” 大概可以算作是监狱

translation.en: but there's a vast difference between being stuck in a tiny cell
translation.zh: 但待在一个小房间里 和被关在监狱里

translation.en: and being in prison.
translation.zh: 还是有很大区别的

translation.en: The what is easy.
translation.zh: “干什么”也好回答

translation.en: Recently I planned and set in motion events
translation.zh: 最近 我策划并发动了一些事

translation.en: to execute the perfect bank robbery.
translation.zh: 以便执行我的完美银行抢劫计划

translation.en: That's also the when.
translation.zh: 这也回答了“什么时候”的问题

translation.en: As for the why, beyond the obvious financial motivation,
translation.zh: 至于“为什么” 并非是常见的金钱动机

translation.en: it's exceedingly simple:
translation.zh: 原因极其简单

translation.en: because I can.
translation.zh: 因为我能做到

translation.en: Which leaves us only with the how.
translation.zh: 剩下就是“怎么做”了

translation.en: And therein, as the Bard would tell us,
translation.zh: 就像莎士比亚说的

translation.en: lies the rub.
translation.zh: 这是个问题

translation.en: Man: He's gonna smell like shit. Man #2: What do you expect after a week?
translation.zh: -他会臭死的 -这样呆一周你还指望不臭？

translation.en: Yeah. Why do you think I roll down the window?
translation.zh: 不然我干嘛摇下车窗？

translation.en: Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: That cop Frazier and his partner are walking into the bank.
translation.zh: 费雷泽那警察和他的同伴进了银行

translation.en: - Are they coming for me? - Can't say. It's just the two of them.
translation.zh: 是冲我来的吗？ 说不好 只有两个人

translation.en: Man: No, everything's going great today.
translation.zh: 今天一切都很顺利

translation.en: No. Be home about 5:30.
translation.zh: 今天一切都很顺利 大概5点30分 好的

translation.en: Okay. Sounds like fun.
translation.zh: 大概5点30分 好的 听上去不错 晚点聊

translation.en: Okay, talk to you later. ( hangs up phone )
translation.zh: 听上去不错 晚点聊

translation.en: - Sorry. - Excuse me.
translation.zh: -抱歉 -不好意思

translation.en: - Mr. Hammond. - Hammond: Good morning, Detectives.
translation.zh: -哈蒙德先生？ -早上好 警探们

translation.en: Just like he planned.
translation.zh: 一切如计划进行

translation.en: I've got a court order here to open a safe-deposit box number 392.
translation.zh: 我有法庭命令打开392号保险箱

translation.en: Oh, thank God.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地

translation.en: - Where is it? - I left it in there.
translation.zh: 戒指在哪？ 我把它留在那里了

translation.en: This way, Detectives.
translation.zh: 这边 警探

translation.en: Why did you do that? You left the ring?
translation.zh: 为什么要这样？你留下了戒指

translation.en: Trust me.
translation.zh: 相信我

translation.en: I left it in good hands.
translation.zh: 我把它交给好人了

translation.en: Russell: I'm no martyr.
translation.zh: 我不是殉道者

translation.en: I did it for the money...
translation.zh: 我是为钱做的

translation.en: but it's not worth much if you can't face yourself in the mirror.
translation.zh: 但如果你无法在镜中直视自己 钱也就不值钱了

translation.en: Respect is the ultimate currency.
translation.zh: 尊重是终极硬通货

translation.en: I was stealing from a man who traded it away for a few dollars.
translation.zh: 我从一个为了一点钱 就出卖灵魂的人那里偷东西

translation.en: And then he tried to wash away his guilt,
translation.zh: 他想要冲走自己的愧疚感

translation.en: drown it in a lifetime of good deeds and a sea of respectability.
translation.zh: 一辈子做好事 获得大家的尊重

translation.en: - Let me get that-- - Ah! Let me.
translation.zh: -让我来吧 -我来

translation.en: - It almost worked too. - Okay.
translation.zh: -差点就成功了 -好吧

translation.en: But inevitably, the further you run from your sins,
translation.zh: 但不可避免 你越想躲避它们

translation.en: the more exhausted you are when they catch up to you.
translation.zh: 等它们找到你时 你下场越惨

translation.en: And they do.
translation.zh: 的确如此 （黄箭口香糖）

translation.en: Son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Certain.
translation.zh: 一定

translation.en: It will not fail.
translation.zh: 不会错的

translation.en: Ho! ( chuckles )
translation.zh: （卡地亚 巴黎 伦敦 纽约）

translation.en: - What do you think that's worth? - If you got to ask, man,
translation.zh: 你觉得值多少钱？ 如果你问 我想说你买不起

translation.en: - you can't afford it. - Thank goodness my girlfriend ain't here.
translation.zh: 如果你问 我想说你买不起 感谢老天我女友不在这

translation.en: "Follow the ring"?
translation.zh: （跟着戒指查） “跟着戒指查”？

translation.en: - Case: Ah, Detective Frazier. - Mr. Case.
translation.zh: -费雷泽警探 -卡斯先生

translation.en: - How are you? - I am great.
translation.zh: -你好吗？ -我很好

translation.en: Nobody got killed at the bank. Everybody's happy. My kind of day.
translation.zh: 银行没有人被杀害 大家都很开心 我喜欢

translation.en: That's wonderful, wonderful.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: - Detective Mitchell. - Mr. Case.
translation.zh: -米歇尔警探 -卡斯先生

translation.en: - Be seated, gentlemen. - Thank you.
translation.zh: -请坐 各位 -谢谢

translation.en: - Can I offer you anything? - No.
translation.zh: -要喝点什么吗？ -不用

translation.en: I must say,
translation.zh: 我必须说…

translation.en: I was most impressed
translation.zh: 我非常惊讶

translation.en: by the way you handled that business.
translation.zh: 你完善处理了这件事

translation.en: - Thank you, Mr. Case. - Whenever I hear the term
translation.zh: 谢谢你 卡斯先生 每当听到“纽约最棒”这个词 我就会想起你

translation.en: "New York's Finest," you're who I think of.
translation.zh: 每当听到“纽约最棒”这个词 我就会想起你

translation.en: You keep the rest of us safe and make it look easy.
translation.zh: 你让我们民众们很安全 而且好像很轻松就做到了

translation.en: Pardon me.
translation.zh: -抱歉 -有什么好笑的？

translation.en: - What's so amusing? - When you say "the rest of us," Mr. Case.
translation.zh: -抱歉 -有什么好笑的？ 你说“民众”的时候 卡斯先生 你得四处看看

translation.en: I mean, you got to look around. "The rest of us"
translation.zh: 你说“民众”的时候 卡斯先生 你得四处看看 你很早就不在“民众”这个范畴了

translation.en: is a category that you haven't qualified for in a long time.
translation.zh: 你很早就不在“民众”这个范畴了

translation.en: Touché, Detective. I won't deny it. I've done well.
translation.zh: 讲得好 警探 我不会否认我很富有

translation.en: Yes, you have. But I'm very confused.
translation.zh: 讲得好 警探 我不会否认我很富有 没错 但我很困惑

translation.en: You see, I got a case
translation.zh: 我接到一个案子

translation.en: where armed robbers laid siege to your bank.
translation.zh: 我接到一个案子 武装劫匪包围你的银行

translation.en: - It is your bank, right? - I'm chairman of the board of directors.
translation.zh: 是你的银行 对吧？ 我是董事会主席

translation.en: Then ai-ka-zai- ka-ben-a-kazoo, the robbers disappear.
translation.zh: 我是董事会主席 结果像变魔术 劫匪失踪了

translation.en: Poof. And they don't take a nickel, right?
translation.zh: 结果像变魔术 劫匪失踪了 一分钱都没拿 对吧？

translation.en: - Are you asking me? - Yes, I'm asking you.
translation.zh: -你问我？ -没错

translation.en: I mean, it's your bank. You own it. I'm asking you.
translation.zh: 这是你的银行 所以我问你

translation.en: It's a tiny part of our organization.
translation.zh: 这只是我们组织的一个小分部

translation.en: No robbers, no real victims, no loot missing.
translation.zh: 没有劫匪 没有实际受害人 没丢东西

translation.en: - Got to be the first time in law-enforcement history., - I never heard of it before.
translation.zh: 这肯定是警察局历史上 第一回碰到的情况

translation.en: So you got to ask yourself, "What the fuck happened?" don't you, Mr. Case?
translation.zh: -我之前从未听闻过 -你得问问自己 “发生了什么？”对吧？卡斯先生

translation.en: - I'm not sure I like your tone. - You don't like my tone?
translation.zh: “发生了什么？”对吧？卡斯先生 我不太喜欢你的强调 警官

translation.en: Then give me a straight answer.
translation.zh: 不喜欢？那就给我个直接的回答

translation.en: It's the founding bank of your empire. You built it. It's your baby.
translation.zh: 这是你帝国开始的第一家银行 你建造了它 它像你的孩子

translation.en: - Give me a straight answer. What do you think happened? - I have no idea.
translation.zh: 给我个痛快答案 你觉得发生了什么？ -我不知道 -拜托 别装了

translation.en: Oh, come on, now. Come on.
translation.zh: -我不知道 -拜托 别装了

translation.en: I tell you what I think. I think you sent that woman in there to patch things up.
translation.zh: 我告诉你我觉得发生了什么 你派那个女人来掩饰这件事

translation.en: Miss White-- I think you paid her. What was she doing in there?
translation.zh: 魏特女士 你给她付了钱 她在那里做什么？

translation.en: This is absurd. Are you implying that I had anything to do with it?
translation.zh: 这太荒谬了 你在暗示我与此案有关吗？

translation.en: Safe-deposit box 392. What's the story on that?
translation.zh: 392号保险箱 有什么故事？

translation.en: - I have no idea what you're-- - Don't lie to me, Mr. Case.
translation.zh: -我不知道你在说 -别撒谎 卡斯先生

translation.en: - I don't lie. - I looked at all the records,
translation.zh: -我没撒谎 -我看了所有记录

translation.en: all the bank records for safe-deposit boxes at your bank.
translation.zh: 你银行所有保险箱的记录

translation.en: At first glance, everything looked fine, but...
translation.zh: 第一眼看 一切似乎都正常 但是…

translation.en: there was one safe-deposit box that had no records.
translation.zh: 只有一个保险箱没有记录

translation.en: I mean, going all the way back to 1948. So I started thinking,
translation.zh: 这就要说回1948年 所以我开始想 谁能回答这个谜语呢？

translation.en: "Who would have the answer to this riddle?"
translation.zh: 所以我开始想 谁能回答这个谜语呢？

translation.en: Probably the man who forgot to mention
translation.zh: 或许是那个没提起

translation.en: that he built the bank in the first place in 1948.
translation.zh: 自己在1948年建立银行的人

translation.en: It doesn't add up, Mr. Case. It does not add up.
translation.zh: 这说不通 卡斯先生

translation.en: I'm afraid I-- I can't be of any further use to you, Detective.
translation.zh: 我想我帮不上更多了 警探先生

translation.en: It's something really bad, isn't it?
translation.zh: 你做过很坏的事吧？

translation.en: Mr. Frazier, I have spent my whole life serving humanity.
translation.zh: 费雷泽先生 我一辈子都在为人服务

translation.en: You can ask anyone who knows me.
translation.zh: 你可以去问问任何了解我的人
